researchers.post: YES, I AGREE, THE VATICAN SHOULD DECARE THAT MR. FRANCIS DE STEFANO BECOME THE SHROUD’S NEW CUSTODIAN AND PERHAPS BE VOTED IN AS THE NEXT POPE AS WELL.
